data.title: Derkach was busted in the United States. And his case is alive
data.meta_description: Lenin died, but his business is alive - they said in the USSR. Then, of course, his business was ratted out. And Komsomol members ratted out it. Like...
data.text:
Lenin died, but his business is alive - they said in the USSR.

Then, of course, his business was ratted out. And Komsomol members ratted out it. Like our Tigipko and hundreds of the same. They quickly switched to business. Due to the connections (which they drank during the drunkenness of the Komsomol conferences) - they established business relations, which were broken during the proclamation of Independence.

They had their own, special corporate spirit. With celebrations in October of the Komsomol Day. With the promotion of their friends to key positions.

In general, no matter what party these people were in, they were Komsomol members. Not Leninists, but Komsomol members in spirit. That is, with a small set of values and principles.

We will not generalize. Not everyone was the same.

But the trend is clear.

That’s what I’m talking about. We still appoint people here on the same principle. Because Zelensky lacks new faces.

But the best Komsomol members are those who, in addition to the Komsomol badge, carried KGB shoulder straps in their pockets, and there were portraits of Iron Felix in their purses between dollar bills.

They are still running in Ukraine. Some have been declassified.

So what? - you will say - he was cut and imprisoned? - as Vysotsky once sang.

Nope, he is free and engaged in personnel policy.

The name of the Komsomol volunteer is Andriy Derkach, Kuchma’s own godson.

Here’s a short detective.

Once Andriy Derkach, who managed Energoatom, hired and raised a promising guy Herman Halushchenko for loyalty.

Later even Halushchenko was employed by the Ministry of Justice under Yanukovych. He headed the judicial department there. So he had close ties with Portnov.

And now attention!

Halushchenko received a sharp career boost: he was appointed as a Deputy Prime Minister of Energoatom in May 2020.

And it was in the spring of 2020 that Andriy Derkach, Herman’s curator, made sharp attacks against Joe Biden.

A coincidence? I do not think so.

At the same time, Volodymyr Oleksandrovych laughed at Derkach’s tapes and said: Wait for more. Than with childish spontaneity he burned down all office.

That is, he indirectly proved the connection between Derkach (read: FSB) and the President’s Office.

Hence, we make the assumption that they paid off with these positions Derkach, who climbed the embrasure as Sasha Matrosov.

Then the scheme was adjusted:

Thus, in September-November Energoatom sold its electricity at 0.68 - 0.85 kopecks per kWh, while the economically reasonable price (at that time) was 1.2 UAH per kWh. Holy shit, right?

And who bought these volumes?

Right. Traders of Rinat Leonidovych and Ihor Valeriiovych.

The amount of the rollback to the President’s Office is unknown. But everyone earned quiet enough.

And you and I paid for it.

That is, so that we understand that by clicking on the light in the kitchen all last year we helped not only Kolomoisky to earn. But for making videos of Zelensky. Well, producers and screenwriters received well enough too.

And now the cherry on top.

Derkach was busted in the United States. And his case is alive.

The Servants of the People, together with their associates from Trust (Dovira) and For the Future and deputies loyal to Akhmetov from OPZZh are going to appoint Herman Hlushchenko as the Minister of Energy.

And believe me, there will be enough votes. Because both the President’s Office and the oligarchs’ offices are interested here.

And children, in those difficult times, in 2021, President Zelensky began an uncompromising struggle against the oligarchs.
